mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents,category) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{category})
mapper.select: select *,DATE_FORMAT(boardCreatedTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS date from board_tbl order by id desc
select *,DATE_FORMAT(boardCreatedTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS date from board_tbl where id = #{id}
select *,DATE_FORMAT(boardCreatedTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS date from board_tbl where category = #{category}
mapper.update: update board_tbl set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id = #{id}
update board_tbl set boardTitle = #{boardTitle} , boardContents = #{boardContents} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_tbl ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
